name: OCKPatientStoreDelegate
desc: An object that receives change callbacks from patient stores.

items.name: func patientStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyPatientStore, didAddPatients: [OCKAnyPatient])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you add patients to the store.

items.name: func patientStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyPatientStore, didUpdatePatients: [OCKAnyPatient])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you update patients in the store.

items.name: func patientStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyPatientStore, didDeletePatients: [OCKAnyPatient])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you delete patients from the store.
